name: BlackOutLove
description:
You are spending a nice eve with your significant other when suddenly the power cuts out. Of course you are the one who has to go fix it. Too bad that it is completely dark, you will have to touch your surroundings to perceive them.

WARNING: DO NOT PLAY THE BROWSER VERSION ON FULLSCREEN, IT CRASHES INSTANTLY

Touch / Interact - Left mouse button
Walk - WASD / Arrow keys

-Known issues:
The end can be problematic since the exit is not completely clean.
When the player falls down a pit, the respawning mechanism does not work in build.
